Name:
Ensure that battery energy storage systems are sited at an appropriate distance from neighboring properties. 
( A.6955-A/S.7197)
Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the governor to sign A.6955-A/S.7197, which would ensure that battery energy storage systems are sited at an appropriate distance from neighboring properties
BodyName: Committee on Fire and Emergency Management

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
